API Reference

This section provides detailed documentation for all API endpoints.

Authentication

Authentication routes for the Contacts API.

This module provides endpoints for user registration, login, email verification, and user profile access.

async src.routes.auth.register(user, db=Depends(get_db))[source]

Register a new user.

Parameters:

  • user (UserCreate) – User registration data

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

Created user data

Return type:

UserResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If user with this email already exists

async src.routes.auth.login(user_data, db=Depends(get_db))[source]

Authenticate user and return access token.

Parameters:

  • user_data (UserLogin) – User login credentials

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

Access token and token type

Return type:

TokenResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If credentials are invalid or email is not verified

async src.routes.auth.verify_email(token, db=Depends(get_db))[source]

Verify user’s email address.

Parameters:

  • token (str) – Email verification token

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

Returns:

Verification status message

Return type:

dict

Raises:

HTTPException – If token is invalid or expired

src.routes.auth.get_user_identifier(request)[source]

Get user identifier for rate limiting.

Parameters:

request (Request) – FastAPI request object

Returns:

User ID if authenticated, otherwise remote address

Return type:

str

async src.routes.auth.read_users_me(request, current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Get current user’s profile.

Parameters:

  • request (Request) – FastAPI request object

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

Current user’s profile data

Return type:

User

Raises:

HTTPException – If user is not authenticated

Contacts

Contact management routes for the Contacts API.

This module provides endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting contacts, as well as retrieving upcoming birthdays.

async src.routes.contacts.create_contact(contact, db=Depends(get_db), current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Create a new contact.

Parameters:

  • contact (ContactCreate) – Contact data to create

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

Created contact data

Return type:

ContactResponse

async src.routes.contacts.get_contacts(skip=Query(0), limit=Query(10), first_name=Query(None), last_name=Query(None), email=Query(None), db=Depends(get_db), current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Get a list of contacts with optional filtering.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – Number of records to skip

  • limit (int) – Maximum number of records to return

  • first_name (Optional[str]) – Filter by first name

  • last_name (Optional[str]) – Filter by last name

  • email (Optional[str]) – Filter by email

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

List of contacts matching the criteria

Return type:

List[ContactResponse]

async src.routes.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(db=Depends(get_db), current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Get a list of contacts with upcoming birthdays.

Parameters:

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

List of contacts with upcoming birthdays

Return type:

List[ContactResponse]

async src.routes.contacts.get_contact(contact_id, db=Depends(get_db), current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Get a specific contact by ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact to retrieve

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

Contact data

Return type:

ContactResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If contact is not found

async src.routes.contacts.update_contact(contact_id, contact, db=Depends(get_db), current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Update a specific contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact to update

  • contact (ContactUpdate) – Updated contact data

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

Updated contact data

Return type:

ContactResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If contact is not found

async src.routes.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id, db=Depends(get_db), current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Delete a specific contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – ID of the contact to delete

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Raises:

HTTPException – If contact is not found

Return type:

None

Users

User management routes for the Contacts API.

This module provides endpoints for managing user profiles and avatars.

async src.routes.users.update_avatar(file=File(PydanticUndefined), db=Depends(get_db), current_user=Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Update user’s avatar image.

Parameters:

  • file (UploadFile) – Image file to upload

  • db (AsyncSession) – Database session

  • current_user (User) – Current authenticated user

Returns:

Updated user data with new avatar URL

Return type:

User

Raises:

HTTPException – If file upload fails or file type is not supported
